text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
UnEMRPatientModel 0..*UnEMR Patient Logical Model
patientId 1..1idPatient identifier
userStatus 1..1stringPatient status
name 1..1HumanNameName of patient
email 1..1stringEmail of patient
phone 0..1stringPhone number of patient
sex 0..1CodeableConceptGender of the patient
dateOfBirth 1..1dateTimeBirthday of the patient
address 0..1AddressAddress of the patient
emergencyContact 0..1BackboneElementEmergency contact of the patient
emergencyContactName 0..1HumanNameName of the emergency contact
emergencyContactRelationship 0..1stringRelationship of the contact to the patient
emergencyContactAddress 0..1AddressAddress of the contact
emergencyContactPhone 0..1stringPhone number of the contact
emergencyContactEmail 0..1stringEmail address of the contact
provider 0..1Reference()The provider handling the patient
providerReferral 0..1Reference()Provider referred by primary provider
providerSelfReferral 0..1Reference()Provider referred by the patient
referralNotes 0..*stringNotes describing the referral
allergies 0..*CodeableConceptAllergies of the patient
immunizations 0..*CodeableConceptImmunization history of the patient
medications 0..*CodeableConceptMedication history of the patient
patientNotes 0..*stringAdditional notes about the patient
comments 0..*stringAdditional comments regarding this patient record
consent 1..1Reference()Patient consent information
auditLog 1..1BackboneElementRecord audit log
createdBy 1..1Reference()Person who created the record
dateCreated 1..1dateTimeDate when the patient record was created
lastUpdatedBy 1..1Reference()Person who recently updated the record
dateLastUpdated 1..1dateTimeDate when the patient record last updated

Documentation for this format

name: UnEMRPatientModel
title: UnEMR Patient Logical Model
publisher: University of San Agustin - Center for Informatics
description: Patient data model implemented in UnEMR

element.definition: Patient data model implemented in UnEMR
Patient identifier
Patient status (e.g. active, inactive, pending approval)
Name of patient
Email of patient
Phone number of patient
Gender of the patient
Birthday of the patient. Required for the calculation of age
Defines where the patient resides
Person identified as emergency contact of the patient
Name of the emergency contact

element.short: Relationship of the contact to the patient
element.definition: Relationship of the contact to the patient
Address of the emergency contact person
Phone number of the emergency contact person
Email address of the emergency contact person
The provider handling the patient
The provider referred by the primary provider to handle the patient
The provider chosen by the patient for consultation. The provider is chosen from a list of providers accessible to the patient
Notes describing the referral
Allergies of the patient
Immunization history of the patient
History of medications taken by the patient relevant to the current consultation
Additional notes about the patient

element.short: Additional comments regarding this patient record
element.definition: Additional comments regarding this patient record
Consent agreed upon by the patient regarding their patient data
Record audit log
Person who created the patient record

element.short: Date when the patient record was created
element.definition: Date when the patient record was created

element.short: Person who recently updated the record
element.definition: Person who recently updated the record

element.short: Date when the patient record last updated
element.definition: Date when the patient record last updated
